name: Prevention.exe
description:
A virus? In my PC? It's more than likely.

Another day, another call from your mum. Her PC is filled with malware which is becoming increasingly out of control. Help her install an antivirus before she gets another BSOD!

A mini point & click game created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

// Plays in 4:3, for ~realism~ //

BUG: Sometimes the password may not show up where it's supposed to - please restart/crash the game if this happens! This will be fixed after the jam voting is finished <3

Feel free to leave a tip - never required, but always appreciated https://ko-fi.com/cybikitty <3
